title: Auth0 tenant + apps configured (task)
body: Create an Auth0 tenant for dev (and a separate one for prod)\nConfigure Single Page App for Next.js and Machine-to-Machine for backend\nCreate roles (poster, worker, admin) and add custom role claim.

title: Dev Postgres + Redis + object storage (task)
body: Provision a local dev Postgres and Redis (docker-compose)\nConfigure object storage (minio or Supabase) for media\nEnsure connection strings and migrations path configured

title: Next.js skeleton + Auth0 integration (task)
body: Create a Next.js skeleton app with @auth0/nextjs-auth0 configured\nAdd placeholder pages: home, create task, task detail, login

title: FastAPI skeleton + JWT verify (task)
body: Create FastAPI project skeleton\nImplement middleware or dependency to validate Auth0 JWT via JWKS\nExpose a protected /api/v1/auth/me endpoint returning the mapped user

title: Basic Postgres models + Prisma schema/migrations (task)
body: Define core Postgres schema for users, tasks, assignments, payments\nCreate Prisma schema and initial migration

title: Task create/list/detail flows (task)
body: Implement POST /api/v1/tasks, GET /api/v1/tasks (search by geo), GET /api/v1/tasks/:id\nFrontend pages: create task, task detail, browse map/list

title: Worker presence & geo (Redis GEO) (task)
body: Implement worker location reporting to Redis (GEOADD)\nExpose worker presence API and sample frontend map for workers

title: Matching + accept flow (lock & assignment) (task)
body: Implement matching service that uses GEORADIUS to find workers\nImplement lock (SETNX) or DB transaction to ensure single acceptor

title: M-Pesa sandbox STK flow (initiate + simulate webhook) (task)
body: Implement /payments/initiate to call Daraja sandbox STK push\nImplement /payments/webhook to receive callbacks and mark payment status

title: Basic notifications (push + SMS fallback) (task)
body: Integrate FCM for push notifications\nAdd SMS fallback via Twilio or Africa's Talking for critical flows

title: Postgres persistence, admin basic views (task)
body: Ensure core tables are persisted in Postgres\nCreate simple admin endpoints or pages for listing users, tasks, and disputes

title: Rating & dispute flows (task)
body: Implement ratings endpoint and dispute creation workflow\nAdmin tooling to resolve disputes

title: Wallet & payout (Daraja B2C) (task)
body: Implement worker wallet ledger and withdrawal requests\nIntegrate Daraja B2C payouts with retry and logging
